mapper.select: SELECT id, cover, name, doctor_id, doctor_name, jump_type, jump_url, sort_order, details_url, hospital_id, city FROM item WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT id, cover, name, doctor_id, doctor_name, jump_type, jump_url, sort_order, details_url, hospital_id, city FROM item WHERE name like concat('%',#{name},'%') AND city = #{city} ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT #{index}, #{count}

SELECT id, cover, name, doctor_id, doctor_name, jump_type, jump_url, sort_order, details_url, hospital_id, city, type_id, parent_type_id, parent_parent_type_id FROM item WHERE type_id = #{typeid} OR parent_type_id = #{typeid} OR parent_parent_type_id = #{typeid} AND city = #{city} ORDER BY sort_order DESC LIMIT #{index}, #{count}
